Class MapDivision<entity extends BaseGameEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.physics.MapDivision<entity>

    entity - should extend BaseGameEntity

    public class MapDivision<entity extends BaseGameEntity>
extends Object
    the class for dividing the map

      • updateMovingEntityZone

        public void updateMovingEntityZone(entity ent)
        Update all Moving Entitis(bullets and gameCharacters) on the map, when they should not be exist the game,they will be removed. when they moved to another cell, it will be added in new cell and removed in old cell.
        Parameters:
        ent - BaseGameEntity

      • getRelevantEntities

        public List<entity> getRelevantEntities(entity entity)
        Get the List of the Entity that should be considered when doing collision test. This method does not do collision test. It only return an entity list in relevant zones
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity should be check collision
        Returns:
        List of entity in relevant zones except the entity itself

        Returns:
